name: Beyond Planet Q #01
description:
this is the second objkt of my #HENesis "Beyond Planet Q" series.
this series is composed of 3 pieces, all portraying queer artists.

the second artist is Linda DeMorrir, a trans woman born in Recife-Brazil and living in Paris-France.
Linda is a DJ and also works as a model. 

this piece is a glitch art made with raw image through Audacity and edited in Premiere Pro. It was shot by me in João Pessoa-Brazil in 2015 at a queer party called Kika. This party no longer exists and for this reason this is what I am calling an "archive and feelings". I will develop this concept better in my nexts series.

listen to Linda's DJ sets and mixtapes here: https://www.mixcloud.com/lindademorrir/


25% of sales will be passed on to her.
